title: Privacy & Disclaimer
text:
This site does not use cookies or track visitors. No personal information is collected unless you contact me via forms or email.




The information provided here is for informational purposes only.

While care is taken to ensure accuracy, no guarantees are made regarding completeness or suitability.

Any external links do not imply endorsement of those sites.

If you have concerns regarding your privacy or site content, please contact me.

title: Consulting
text:
Data strategy & governance
Digital transformation planning
AI and data science implementation
Multi-modal clinical data analysis





Led AstraZeneca CVRM data science strategy, enhancing R&D decision-making
Delivered strategic data science advisory to European research institutions
Implemented FAIR data policies, reducing data access times from months to hours





Pharmaceutical and biotech companies
Corporate teams seeking data-driven transformation
Organisations wanting actionable insights from complex datasets





Collaborative workshops with key stakeholders
Tailored data strategy aligned with organisational goals
Hands-on mentoring and team development for sustainable change
